title: What champion do you find boring  to play

replies.body: I dislike most attack speed focused "right-click to win" adc's
So the not just right click adc's are good {{champion:119}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:202}}  just wondering?
Exactly. Though that may just come from the fact that i play mages and ap assassins most.

> [{quoted}](name=BateGamer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4LksGtE,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-22T18:27:15.018+0000)
>
> Exactly. Though that may just come from the fact that i play mages and ap assassins most.

If you dislike the stack attack speed and right click to win ADC's and you like to play mages/AP assassins, then you would prob like {{champion:42}} a lot. Since he isn't attack speed based (only attack speed he'll prob buy would be {{item:3078}}) and he has strong burst that is mostly magic damage. Plus he is kind of like an assassin when he has his package lol.
God I must be a nightmare for you {{champion:122}} {{champion:420}} ?

Hey, people can have their preferences. I don't expect the entire community to comply to my likes and dislikes. I do enjoy playing early game champs so Darius and Illaoi have been fun to play just because the can be oppressive early on and you can get a good lead to destroy people late game.
sona, 3/4 abilities are auto targeted making it incredibly boring to play her, so boring I dodge if I get her in ARAM, screw her 70% win rate she is god damn sleep inducing boring
Caitlyn.

{{champion:86}} {{champion:27}} 
nuff said
Any champion that just runs at people and mows them down while being tanky.
{{champion:44}}
Wait, you can OOM on Vel'Koz?
I've heard tales of this happening on ARAM. I've never believed them.

{{champion:75}}  farm for 40 minutes then the "fun" begins
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Any champion that you have to run at the enemy like a boosted gorilla and win or die.

{{champion:106}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:2}}

{{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} 

Good god I can't stand this champ, he's soooooo boring to play.
{{champion:40}} nothing fun you can really explore in her kit

Most tanks, because they don't do enough damage and thus are completely dependent on their teammates to finish games. 

Most bruisers due to lack of range and kit flexibility. Most of them just die late game before they get the chance to do anything important. their early-mid games aren't fun enough to make up for that. 

I like actually being able to kill targets. Not that it's what the focus of the game is, but as long as the enemy is dead there is always a chance to win.

{{champion:1}} {{champion:7}}  a lot of mages tbh. i just can't. I enjoy {{champion:115}}  tho but most mages are just EXTREMELY boring due to how uninteractive they are. also mana issues and cd gating
TBH, I think they're all boring save for Lux and Nami.

{{champion:23}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:106}} 
nothing is satisfying to execute make them boring they are probably a few more but I haven't played everyone.
{{champion:61}}
all of them
{{champion:45}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:20}}
Most of the champions I find pretty boring to play. I enjoy playing only a handful. I guess {{champion:12}} and {{champion:19}} are up there for me in terms of being boring.
Malphite and Irelia.
